attributes.action: create more paramedics jobs rather than using ambulance technicians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After seeing 'tonight' about the state of the ambulance service, i would like to see more paramedics on the front line to save lives, ambulance technicians do a excellent job but they cannot give certain drugs that would save lives, at the moment in most regions you have a 50% chance of getting  ambulance technician who might not be able to give life saving drugs, would you want that for a member of your family, i know i would'nt

rejection.details: The petition overlaps with http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/paramedic/ Please consider signing this before opening a new petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
